statements: UPDATE CustomerCommunicationRecords SET communication_type = 'Email' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerCommunicationRecords SET communication_content = 'Meeting scheduled for tomorrow' WHERE communication_type = 'Phone';
UPDATE CustomerCommunicationRecords SET communication_type = 'Email', communication_content = 'Sent an update email' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND communication_date = '2022-07-15';
UPDATE CustomerCommunicationRecords SET communication_content = 'Had a phone conversation', communication_type = 'Phone' WHERE communication_date = '2022-07-20' AND customer_id = 102;
UPDATE communication_records SET communication_details = 'Follow up meeting scheduled for next week' WHERE record_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_details SET last_name = 'Johnson', email = 'jane.johnson@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 202;
UPDATE customer_details SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='1234567890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE communication_records SET communication_type='New Communication', communication_details='Updated Details' WHERE record_id=5;
UPDATE customers SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='1234567890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_notes='Follow up scheduled for next week' WHERE interaction_id=2;
UPDATE customers SET email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE feedback SET rating=5, feedback_message='Great service!' WHERE feedback_id=201;
UPDATE Customer SET contact_number='+1234567890' WHERE customer_name='Alice';
UPDATE Interaction SET interaction_notes='Followed up with the customer' WHERE interaction_type='Call' AND interaction_date='2021-10-15';
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name='John Doe', contact_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1
UPDATE Interaction SET interaction_notes='Follow up meeting scheduled', interaction_date='2022-11-15' WHERE interaction_id=5
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '123-456-7890', email = 'example@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
